name: Filling scale type WAEK 100 ex for LPG
description:
in carousel version
ex-proof electronic filling scale with electrical power supply unit
Shut-off: electronic-automatic, after eaching the set filling
weight
Total weighing capacity:100 kg
Tare weight setting: by keys, max. 50 kg, graduation 100 g
Filling weight setting: by keys, max. 50 kg, graduation 100 g
Platform dimensions: 400 x 500 mm
Scale base: full electronic, without mechanically moving parts,
Electrical supply: through the power supply unit, built in an ex-proof
housing
Voltage: 230 V / 50 Hz
Connections: input and output: male thread
W 21,8 x 1/14" left-hand,
equipped with:
*****************
- pneumatic filling connection 10324 (61008)
- pneumatic push-off device (60726)
- gallows with weight compensator (69733)
- roller table 13276 (60728)
- filter 5500 (60734)
- LPG hose length 1250 (61607)
- LPG hose length 1750 (61608)
- pneumatic hose (61620)
- cylinder holder 7174 (60735)
scale not calibrated, ready for operation
